mapper.select: select b.board_pk , b.user_pk , b.board_title , b.board_body , DATE_FORMAT(b.board_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS boardRegDate , b.board_view_count , u.user_name from board b left join user u on b.user_pk = u.user_pk ORDER BY b.board_reg_date ASC;
select b.board_pk, b.user_pk, u.user_name, b.board_title, b.board_body, b.board_reg_date, b.board_view_count from board b left join user u on b.user_pk = u.user_pk where b.board_pk = #{boardPk}

select c.comment_pk, c.board_pk, c.user_pk, c.comment_body, c.comment_reg_date, u.user_name from board_comment c left join user u on c.user_pk = u.user_pk where c.board_pk = #{boardPk} order by c.comment_reg_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (board_pk , user_pk , comment_body , comment_reg_date) values (#{boardPk}, #{userPk}, #{commentBody}, now())
